neft.description: NEFT allows fund transfers in batches. Usually credited within 2 hours during bank working hours.
neft.limits: No minimum, up to ₹10 lakh per transaction.

online.steps: Login and select NEFT under fund transfer options.

offline.steps: Fill out the NEFT form and submit it at any branch.

rtgs.description: RTGS is for real-time fund transfers. Best for amounts over ₹2 lakh.

online.steps: Login and choose RTGS under fund transfer services.

offline.steps: Visit a branch and fill out the RTGS form for processing.

imps.description: IMPS is instant, available 24x7, including holidays.

online.steps: Login and select IMPS under fund transfer.

offline.steps: Limited branches support IMPS offline — visit and inquire.

online.steps: Login and navigate to Forex > Inward Remittance.

offline.steps: Visit a branch and fill in the remittance form.

online.steps: Login and go to Forex > Outward Remittance.

offline.steps: Go to a branch with identity and purpose documents.

online.steps: Upload invoice through trade portal after login.

offline.steps: Submit physical bills at branch for verification.

online.steps: Login and request forex forward contract online.

offline.steps: Speak to branch Forex officer to initiate the process.

online.steps: Use Forex > Currency Converter after login.

offline.steps: Visit branch to request currency exchange.
